value.title: Modulate’s ToxMod uses AI to scan game voice chat for toxic speech

value.title: Gaming platform Roblox acquires 3D facial animation firm Loom.ai
value.excerpt: U.S. gaming platform Roblox Corp said on Monday it has acquired Loom.ai, a San Francisco-based startup providing real-time facial animation technology for 3D avatars.

value.title: Amazon's Zoox reveals self-driving taxi
value.excerpt: Amazon-owned Zoox has unveiled the autonomous electric vehicle it plans to launch in a ride-hailing service. The four-passenger car has sliding doors and center-facing seats.

value.title: How AI Helps Advance Immunotherapy And Precision Medicine

value.title: Researchers aim to use artificial intelligence to save endangered whales in B.C.
value.excerpt: Researchers are aiming to “teach” a computer to recognize the sounds of resident killer whales in order to develop a warning system for preventing ships from fatally striking endangered orcas off British Columbia’s coast.

value.title: Algorithmic And AI Assessment Tools — A New Frontier In Disability Discrimination
value.excerpt: Algorithmic assessment tools are a serious threat to disability rights. An inescapable tension exists between an algorithm’s use of big population-level data and the highly individualized experiences of disabled people.

value.title: Google used a 64-camera rig to train its portrait lighting AI
